description:

Save time and energy with the app's convenient one-click replacement feature. Simply choose your preferred icon changer, themes, widgets, and wallpapers, and with a one click, transform your device's appearance to match your desired aesthetic.

An indispensable application for those who like aesthetics

"Unleash Your Inner Artist with DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft! 

Tired of generic phone backgrounds? Express your unique style and stay trendy with DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft! Your ultimate creative hub, packed with powerful tools to design stunning, personalized wallpapers. Best of all, it's FREE! 

Your phone reflects you, so we built this app for fun, easy customization. From cute aesthetics to dark vibes, cool anime to lively animals, there's something for everyone. Our mission: keep your screen fresh, trendy, and uniquely YOU! 

Dive into a World of Creativity with Our 3 Main Powerhouse Features: 

1. DIY Frame Wallpaper: Your Photos, Our Magic Frames!
Transform your photos and memories into captivating wallpapers! Our DIY Frame Wallpaper section offers a vast collection of stylish frames and templates.

- Dynamic & Static Frames: Live Frames add animations; Static Frames offer timeless elegance. Photos blend perfectly with our designs!
- Easy Photo Import: Seamlessly import any gallery image. Our tools ensure perfect fit.
- Custom Backgrounds: Experiment with colors, patterns, or textures behind your photos for the perfect mood.
stickers: Add fun, trendy stickers from our diverse library to your masterpiece!
- Collage Wallpaper Craft: 100% Freeform Creation – Your Canvas, Your Rules!
2, Unleash your imagination! Collage Wallpaper Craft gives you 100% creative freedom to design unique photo collages from scratch. No templates – just pure artistic expression. Build your vision, pixel by pixel!

- Freely Import Photos: Bring in unlimited photos! Arrange, resize, rotate, and layer them as you envision.
- Add Trendy Stickers: Access our vast, updated sticker collection. Quirky characters, aesthetic elements, memes – find the perfect sticker!
- Express with Text: Add custom text, quotes, or messages. Choose from diverse fonts, colors, and styles.
- Creative Brush Tool: Draw directly on your collage! Add unique doodles, highlights, or patterns.
- Artistic Filters: Apply stunning filters for a cohesive, professional look.
3. Curated Wallpaper Gallery: Trendy, Diverse & Always Fresh!
Beyond DIY, explore our incredible, **FREE** gallery of ready-to-use wallpapers, hand-picked and constantly updated with the hottest trends:

- Aesthetic Vibes: Dreamy pastels, minimalist designs.
- Anime Magic: Iconic characters, breathtaking scenes.
- Adorable Animals: Cute cats, majestic wildlife.
- Dark Mode Delights: Sleek, battery-friendly themes.
- Silly Smile & Fun: Whimsical characters, funny memes.
Stay trendy! We constantly update our frames, stickers, and curated wallpapers with the latest mobile culture, from TikTok aesthetics to meme crazes. And yes, it's all FREE – creativity should have no bounds or price tags!

Download DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft now and transform your phone into a canvas of endless possibilities! Create, customize, captivate – all for FREE! 

Support us!
Our company always seek to improve our apps, so any thoughts are welcome via the feedback form in app’s setting.Through our app, we empower you to make your phone as awesome as you.

description:
Discover the Ultimate AR Anime Drawing Experience!
Unleash your creativity with AR Anime Drawing, the revolutionary app that blends augmented reality (AR) with artistic creation. Whether you're a pro artist or a beginner, this drawing app lets you transform photos into stunning art. With neon, glow, AI drawing, and sketch tools, you can easily create your masterpiece.

Key Features:

Transform Photos into Art
Use AR drawing to turn photos into sketches, doodle art, or oil paintings. Select from various styles like sketch, neon drawing, and AI drawing to add unique effects and creative flair.

Vibrant Artistic Filters
Explore glow draw, color pop, and other artistic filters to enhance your creations. Whether it's a quick doodle or a detailed oil painting, the app offers multiple styles for endless possibilities.

User-Friendly Interface
This drawing app for kids and adults alike features an intuitive interface, making it easy to create art. Upload a photo, pick a filter, and let the magic happen with AR drawing.

Save & Share Your Creations
Save your AR drawing sketch and easily share it on social media. Whether you’re sharing a neon drawing or AI drawing, it’s simple to showcase your creativity with others.

Interactive Drawing Tools
Use tools like the pen, eraser, and opacity slider to perfect your sketches. The trace drawing feature lets you outline photos for added detail or create something entirely new with ease.

Explore Endless Art Styles
Whether you want to create a cartoon sketch, a detailed portrait, or neon drawing, the app has filters for every style. Use AI drawing tools and art drawing options to transform your work.

Perfect for All Ages
Whether you're creating drawing games for kids or looking for a doodle app to explore your artistic side, this app is perfect for everyone. Let your kids enjoy sketching, doodling, and tracing with drawing apps for kids.

Why Choose AR Anime Drawing?

Enhance Your Photos: Turn your photos into stunning works of art with AR drawing and neon glow.

Creative Freedom: With doodle, sketch, and neon drawing filters, the app lets you control your art.

For Everyone: Whether you’re an expert or a beginner, this app makes it easy to create sketches, tracing drawings, and more.

Art Anytime, Anywhere: Create art on the go with the AR drawing app. From doodle art to neon sketches, the possibilities are endless.

Why You'll Love AR Anime Drawing

Fun and Easy: Whether you're into drawing games or simply want a fun doodle app, AR Anime Drawing provides everything you need.

Endless Styles: Experiment with different filters like neon drawing, AI drawing, and art drawing.

AR Drawing Magic: Bring your art to life with augmented reality. Trace, sketch, and doodle your way to creative perfection.

Download AR Anime Drawing Now!
Start creating today with AR drawing, neon glow, and sketch tools. Whether you're creating detailed portraits or fun doodle art, this app gives you the power to transform your photos into works of art. Download now and start your creative journey!

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

*ibisPaint's terms of service
https://ibispaint.com/agreement.jsp

What if your Lock screen, Home screen, and even Control Center could reflect your personality, style, and mood — every single day?

That’s exactly what Wallpapers, Widget & Theme App delivers. Designed for users who want more than just a background image, this app gives you full creative control over how your phone looks and feels. Whether you’re into cute, minimal, bold, or aesthetic styles, this app has everything you need to create a screen setup that feels like you.

WALLPAPERS, WIDGET & THEME APP – MAIN FEATURES

- Aesthetic Wallpapers for Every Style
Choose from a constantly updated collection of high-quality wallpapers. Every style, every mood — whether it’s soft pastels, dark abstracts, or seasonal designs.

- Create Unique Wallpapers with AI
Just type in an idea, a vibe, or a color scheme — our AI turns your words into a unique wallpaper you won’t find anywhere else.

- Custom Widgets for Home & Lock Screen
Build your own widgets for clock, battery, quotes, countdowns, and more. Perfectly match them to your wallpaper with styles that blend beautifully.

- Curated Themes with Matching Design
No more mismatched screens. Apply curated themes that include wallpapers and widgets, designed to work perfectly together.

- Custom Control Center
Redesign your iPhone's Control Center to match your style. Change background color, layout feel, and add new aesthetics.

- Tutorial Setting – Easy Setup for New Users
First time customizing? No worries. Our tutorial setting walks you through every feature — simple, clear, and visual. You’ll get your dream screen setup in minutes.

HOW TO USE

- Open the app and explore Wallpapers, Widgets, or Themes.
- Tap “Preview” to see how elements look together.
- Apply your chosen style to your home or lock screen.
- Use the AI tool to generate custom wallpapers.
- Follow the step-by-step tutorial to learn all features.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase.
- Subscriptions will renew automatically unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- When the subscription is canceled, it will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.
- If offered, any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

DISCLAIMER
This app is not affiliated with any of the brands or platforms mentioned. All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

Thanks for using Wallpapers, Widget & Theme App.

Features at a Glance

Ready to elevate your iPhone experience? Download Wallpics now and unlock a universe of live wallpapers, DIY creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper, and 4K quality backgrounds—tailored just for you!

Experience the next generation of drawing with Sketchify – the ultimate tool that transforms how you sketch, trace, and create art. Powered by advanced Augmented Reality (AR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI), this app redefines what's possible in digital and real-world drawing.

Whether you're a beginner, a hobbyist, or a professional artist, Sketchify provides all the tools you need to learn, practice, and create – with unmatched precision and creative freedom.

CORE FEATURES

* AR Drawing – Project, Trace & Create:

- Use your phone or tablet camera to project any image onto real-world surfaces – paper, canvas, wall, or any workspace.
- Trace outlines directly through the screen in real time, making it perfect for learning to draw, replicating artwork, or creating complex designs.
- AR Drawing adapts to your environment and gives you the feeling of drawing with guidance – not just on screen, but in real space.

* Import Image – Draw Anything You Imagine:

- Instantly import photos, sketches, or designs from your photo library.
- Combine with AR Drawing to trace your personal references with perfect positioning.
- Adjust size, rotate, zoom, and align images with your surface for an accurate drawing experience.
- This feature empowers you to draw anything – whether it's a photo you took, a downloaded image, or your own digital creation.

* Drawing Lessons – Learn, Practice, Improve

- Step-by-step drawing guides help you move from basic shapes to advanced techniques.
- Great for beginners who want structured learning or artists looking to refine their skills.
- Lessons are fully integrated with AR drawing for a fully interactive learning experience.

* AI Drawing – Let Ideas Become Art Instantly

- Describe any concept or scene, and our built-in AI generates original artwork within seconds.
- Customize AI-generated images and use them as references for tracing or sketching.
- Ideal for overcoming creative blocks and finding inspiration on demand.

* Search Image – Unlimited Visual Inspiration

- Search directly inside the app to find high-quality image references without switching apps.
- Combine search + AR + import for the fastest and most intuitive drawing workflow possible.

* Recording – Capture Your Entire Creative Process

- Record your drawing sessions from start to finish.
- Perfect for tutorials, sharing your process on social media, or reviewing your progress.
- Export and share with a single tap.

* Coloring Tools – Bring Your Art to Life

- After tracing or sketching, enhance your artwork with easy-to-use coloring tools.
- Play with palettes, gradients, and fill options to make your drawings vibrant and personal.
- Ideal for finished pieces or creative practice sessions.

SMART FEATURES & CUSTOM SETTINGS

- Customizable projection: adjust image placement, zoom, and rotation for optimal drawing alignment.

- User-friendly interface: clean, responsive, and made for creators at any skill level.

- Works seamlessly on both iPhone and iPad.

WHY CREATORS LOVE Sketchify

- AR Drawing is the foundation – unmatched precision and freedom.

- Import anything you want to draw – your photos, AI creations, web images, and more.

- Combines drawing, tracing, coloring, AI, and learning in one powerful app.

AI Studio - AI Video Generator
Create AI Videos, Clips & Reels from Text or Images

Turn ideas into cinematic video content in seconds. No editing skills required.

AI Studio transforms a short prompt or reference images into a fully animated movie-style shot, perfect for UGC ads, promos, trailers, reels/shorts, tutorials, and social storytelling.

Powered by industry models
Built on Veo 3 & Veo 3.1 (Google DeepMind) and Sora 2 (OpenAI) via official APIs. Not affiliated, sponsored, or endorsed by Google or OpenAI.

What you can make
Text-to-Video: Describe a scene → get an animated clip.
Image-to-Video: Upload a still → generate realistic footage.
Reference-to-Video: Keep the same face/product/outfit/background across scenes with multi-image references.
Ad Factory: Brief → shot list → ready-to-publish UGC ad.
Fine Controls: Lock colors, camera, composition; exclude elements.
Aspect Ratios: 9:16 (vertical), 16:9 (landscape).
Quality & Formats: Up to 1080p exports, no watermark.
Brand-safe Exports: Designed for TikTok, Reels, Shorts, YouTube.

Great for: social posts, promo clips, product demos, ad creatives, logo stingers, explainers, movie-style trailers, experimental AI video art.

How it works
Pick a model (e.g., Veo Fast/Pro, Sora Fast/Pro).
Enter a prompt and optionally add reference images.
Preview settings (length, aspect, audio) and see required credits before you generate.
Render your movie-style clip and export.
Typical length per generation: 4–12 seconds (model-dependent).
Create longer pieces by stitching multiple shots/clips.

Credits, Costs & Plans
Credits required per generation depend on model, duration, and quality.
The credit cost is shown upfront before you hit generate.
Choose pay-as-you-go credit packs or auto-renewing subscriptions.
One-time credit packs: e.g., 60 / 150 / 450 / 1000 /2150 credits.
Weekly subscriptions: e.g., 60 / 100 / 150 / 250 / 350 / 450 / 750 credits.
Monthly subscriptions: e.g., 150 / 250 / 350 / 450 / 600 / 900 / 1000 / 2150 credits.
 
Auto-renewal: Subscriptions renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the period ends. Your iTunes account is charged at purchase and within 24 hours of renewal.

Rollover: Unused credits continue to roll over while your subscription stays active.
Refunds: Handled by Apple under Apple’s policies.

Legal & Disclaimers
Model access: The app connects to third-party generative models (including Veo 3/Veo 3.1 and Sora 2) via our servers. This is not an official Google or OpenAI product.

Affiliation: Not owned by, endorsed by, or affiliated with Google, Google DeepMind, OpenAI, or their affiliates. We participate in Google for Startups.

Support


Questions or feedback? hello@aivideomaker.app
